item.title: Python Module Entry Points
item.description: Python Module Entry Points You could use pkg_resources to get the full list of entry points. 1 2 3 4 5 6 for ep in pkg_resources.iter_entry_points('manila.scheduler.filters'): print(ep.name, ep.dist.location, ep.module_name) # Sample output AvailabilityZoneFilter /opt/stack/manila manila.scheduler.filters.availability_zone ShareGroupReplicationFilter /opt/stack/manila manila.scheduler.filters.share_group_filters.share_group_replication manila.scheduler.filters here is called group or namespace. You can get it via package name as below: 1 2 3 4 5 6 for e in pkg_resources.working_set: if e.key == 'manila': print(e.
